entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow in the morning. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
